legendaryPulls.name: Alien Puppy
legendaryPulls.description: Looks and acts much like a puppy from Earth, but you don't want to get too close...

legendaryPulls.name: Betsy
legendaryPulls.description: A human astronaut. Although not an alien to us, she looks pretty odd to those who inhabit the comsos.

legendaryPulls.name: Nova
legendaryPulls.description: Nova is a real-life alien princess! The third eye allows her to see into the future and she sees that you're going to pass CS391!
